typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sensorid as integer,
		timestamp as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss',
		temperature_from_humidity as double,
		temperature_from_pressure as double,
		humidity as double,
		pressure as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
